title: Interior with Women
medium: oil on paper board mounted to cradled mahogany panel
credit_line: Purchased through the generosity of Mrs. Alan M. Scaife
provenance_text:
Edouard Vuillard [1868-1940], until 1902; purchased by Bernheim-Jeune, Paris, France, October 11, 1902 [1]; sold to Romaine Brooks [1874-1970], Paris, France, April 28, 1905 [2]; Romaine Brooks Collection. Wildenstein & Co., Inc., New York, NY, by October 1962; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1962. 

Notes: 
[1]. Purchase price 600 francs; stock no. 12704.
[2]. Purchase price 1500 francs. Early provenance from "Vuillard, The Inexhaustible Glance", by Antoine Salomon and Guy Cogeval, vol. 2, Skira, 2003, p. 862.

creator.death_place: Baule, la (Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France)
